rooms.name: Two-Car Garage
rooms.description: Large space designed for two vehicles, includes storage and access to the penthouse.

rooms.name: Open Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: Bohemian styled living area with mixed textures, plants, art installations and ample natural light. Adjacent to central courtyard.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen with bohemian accents; designed for functionality and socializing while preserving Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom incorporating natural elements, organic textures. Aligned with Vastu guidelines ensuring clarity and calmness.

rooms.name: Ground Floor Bathroom
rooms.description: Essential ground floor bathroom with traditional touches and natural materials.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.details: Large entryway designed in bohemian style, incorporating local elements. The entrance is positioned according to Vastu principles for auspicious energy.

openings.name: Central Courtyard Access
openings.details: Open space that connects the various rooms on the ground floor; designed with a blend of open-air elements and decorative water feature for balance and harmony as per Vastu.

openings.name: Garage Door Access
openings.details: Modern sliding door that provides easy access to the two-car garage, integrated with security features and aesthetic design in line with bohemian style.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with high ceilings, bohemian decor, natural materials and a private balcony. Arranged in accordance with Vastu for prosperity.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Bohemian styled bedroom designed for a secondary occupant, ensuring comfort and privacy. Positioned to maximize positive energy flow per Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Third Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with bohemian elements and natural light, designed for flexibility as well as comfort.

rooms.name: First Floor Bathroom
rooms.description: Well-appointed bathroom that complements the bedrooms on this level; incorporates Vastu-friendly placement to ensure balance and positive energy.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.details: Elegant staircase connecting ground floor and first floor, designed with natural materials and incorporating bohemian art. Placed to encourage upward energy flow in line with Vastu.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.details: Provides access to a private balcony with greenery and water feature for relaxation, designed per local architectural norms and Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Roof Deck/ Terrace
rooms.description: Expansive roof terrace offering panoramic views, designed as an extension of the living space with bohemian decor and open seating areas. Aligns with Vastu for relaxation and positive energy.

openings.name: Rooftop Access
openings.details: Access point to the roof deck via an elegantly designed access door that maintains the bohemian aesthetic and adheres to Vastu principles.
